Package ca.phon.ipa

Class SyllableBoundary

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.ipa.IPAElement
ca.phon.ipa.SyllableBoundary
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtendable, Visitable<IPAElement>
public final class SyllableBoundary extends IPAElement
Represents a syllable boundary between words. While other types of IPAElements can also represent a syllable boundary, this is specifically for the 'forced' syllable boundary marked by a '.' in the transcript.
